questions.onset: When did the vision loss occur?
questions.one_or_both_eyes: Is it affecting one eye or both eyes?
questions.complete_or_partial: Is the vision completely lost or partially affected?
questions.trauma: Was there any eye or head trauma?

triage_rules.reason: Sudden complete vision loss - Possible retinal detachment or stroke - Immediate Emergency Care Required
Vision loss with headache - Possible temporal arteritis - Emergency evaluation needed
